references.reason: This paper is a comprehensive technical report on GPT-4, a large language model that is central to the research in this paper.
OpenAI Gym is the foundational framework used for developing and evaluating AI agents, and is directly referenced in the methodology of this work.

references.paper_title: BERT: Pre-training of deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding
references.reason: BERT is a foundational language model used in many tasks in MLGYM-Bench and is directly compared to the LLM agents in the paper.

references.paper_title: Gymnax: A JAX-based reinforcement learning environment library
references.reason: Gymnax is the reinforcement learning environment used in several MLGYM-Bench tasks and is crucial for the evaluation in this work.

references.paper_title: AutoML Decathlon: Diverse tasks, modern methods, and efficiency at scale
references.reason: The AutoML Decathlon introduced the AUP score, used to evaluate performance in this paper; it's a key evaluation metric of the current work.
